name: links-collection-angularfire
description: This example app it allows collecting links, tagging(and then filtering by this tags) and adding description for them. Used technologies: * [RequireJS](http://requirejs.org/) * [AngularJS](https://angularjs.org/) with [AngularFire](https://www.firebase.com/docs/web/libraries/angular/) * [Firebase](https://www.firebase.com/) as storage
